pbl.title: AI Ethics in Social Media
pbl.title_es: Ética de IA en Redes Sociales
pbl.description: Explore ethical considerations when implementing AI in social media platforms
pbl.description_zh: 探討在社交媒體平台實施AI時的倫理考量
pbl.description_es: Explora las consideraciones éticas al implementar IA en plataformas de redes sociales

tasks.title: Understanding AI Bias
tasks.scenario: A social media platform wants to implement an AI system to automatically detect and remove harmful content. However, initial tests show the system may have biases.
tasks.scenario_zh: 一個社交媒體平台想要實施AI系統來自動檢測和刪除有害內容。然而，初步測試顯示該系統可能存在偏見。
tasks.background: AI systems can inherit biases from their training data, leading to unfair treatment of certain groups.
tasks.background_zh: AI系統可能從訓練數據中繼承偏見，導致對某些群體的不公平對待。

tasks.title: Designing Fair AI Systems
tasks.scenario: You need to propose solutions to make the content moderation AI more fair and inclusive.
tasks.scenario_zh: 您需要提出解決方案，使內容審核AI更加公平和包容。

discovery.title: Exploring Generative AI
discovery.description: Discover the capabilities and limitations of generative AI through hands-on exploration
discovery.description_zh: 通過實踐探索生成式AI的能力和限制
discovery.description_es: Descubre las capacidades y limitaciones de la IA generativa a través de la exploración práctica

tasks.title: Text Generation Exploration
tasks.prompt: Experiment with different prompts to see how AI generates text. Try creating stories, poems, and technical explanations.
tasks.prompt_zh: 嘗試不同的提示詞，看看AI如何生成文本。試著創作故事、詩歌和技術說明。

assessment.title: AI Literacy Basics
assessment.title_es: Conceptos Básicos de Alfabetización en IA
assessment.description: Test your understanding of fundamental AI concepts
assessment.description_zh: 測試您對AI基本概念的理解
assessment.description_es: Prueba tu comprensión de los conceptos fundamentales de IA

tasks.title: What is Machine Learning?
tasks.question: Which of the following best describes machine learning?
tasks.question_zh: 以下哪項最能描述機器學習？
tasks.context: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that has gained significant attention in recent years.
tasks.context_zh: 機器學習是人工智能的一個子集，近年來受到了廣泛關注。

options.text: A method where computers learn from data without explicit programming
options.text_zh: 計算機無需明確編程就能從數據中學習的方法

options.text: A way to make computers think like humans
options.text_zh: 讓計算機像人類一樣思考的方法
